name: Another memory profiler
author: Alex Poirot
description: "Another memory profiler" is now an effective tool, which display a lot of information about all objects living in your Firefox instance! By all I mean not only website javascript objects, but all objects used by Firefox in its windows, sidebars, extensions, all tabs, iframes, etc. http://blog.techno-barje.fr/public/another-profiler/another-profiler_techno-barje.fr.xpi
